1:
Yahweh is my light and my salvation;\q whom should I fear?
\q Yahweh is my life's refuge;
\q whom should I dread?


\q
2:
When evildoers approached me to devour my flesh,\q my adversaries and my enemies stumbled and fell.
\q
3:
Though an army encamps against me,\q my heart will not fear;
\q though war rises up against me,
\q even then I will remain confident.


\q
4:
One thing have I asked of Yahweh, and I will seek that:\q that I may live in the house of Yahweh all the days of my life,
\q to see the beauty of Yahweh
\q and to meditate in his temple.


\q
5:
For in the day of trouble he will hide me in his shelter;\q in the cover of his tent he will conceal me.
\q He will lift me high on a rock!
\q
6:
Then my head will be lifted up above my enemies all around me,\q and I will offer sacrifices of joy in his tent!
\q I will sing and make songs to Yahweh!


\q
7:
Hear, Yahweh, my voice when I cry out!\q Have mercy on me, and answer me!
\q
8:
My heart says about you,\q "Seek his face!" I seek your face, Yahweh!


\q
9:
Do not hide your face from me;\q do not turn your servant away in anger!
\q You have been my helper;
\q do not forsake me or abandon me, God of my salvation!
\q
10:
Even if my father and my mother forsake me,\q Yahweh will take me in.


\q
11:
Teach me your way, Yahweh!\q Lead me on a level path
\q because of my enemies.
\q
12:
Do not give me up to the desires of my enemies,\q for false witnesses have risen up against me,
\q and they breathe out violence!


\q
13: What would have happened to me if I had not believed that I would see the goodness of Yahweh in the land of the living?\q
14:
Wait for Yahweh;\q be strong, and let your heart be courageous!
\q Wait for Yahweh!
